channel.title: I need help plz
channel.description: hi. i am very new 2 this server development stuff :). so i have this server that im workin on. but i cant seem 2 find out how 2 rase the max lvl of stats and combat lvls. so i thought i would just make the str bonus' and attack bonus' and the def bonus' of my equipment higher (so i would b godly :)) but i cant seem 2 find that eather! :(. can someone help me plz.

item.title: I need help plz
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

For changing the Bonuses on Item’s go into

Item.Cfg

tem = 15333 Armadyl_Godsword A_beautiful,_heavy_sword. 30000000 30000000 30000000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8

After the 1st three #'s Those are the bonuses, change them to your liking.

Read full topic
